name: Incorporated - WIP - Part 1
description:
Incorporated is a personal project made in Twine, in which you play as a private investigator who is sent by a concerned father to look into his sons recent strange behavior.

This project is a work in progress so there may be spelling errors and parts that may not align well, so any feedback you could give me is very appreciated!

I will be uploading the full project when it is finished, more to come soon!
